data.name: Dino Dini's Kick Off Revival - Joystick tool
data.detailed_description:
Do you want to dust off your old joysticks and rediscover the original sensations of Kick Off ?
It is now possible with this amazing tool : plug in your favorite controller, launch the tool, and it will generate a configuration file to integrate in the game* !

*We cannot guarantee a 100% compatbility with every existing controllers, in particular if you use an emulator or adaptator
